mkdir -p /home/afkar/.ssh;
touch /home/afkar/.ssh/authorized_keys;
useradd -d /home/afkar afkar;
usermod -aG sudo afkar;
chown -R afkar:afkar /home/afkar/;
chmod 700 /home/afkar/.ssh;
chmod 600 /home/afkar/.ssh/authorized_keys;
echo 'ssh-rsa  afkar@china-hop-server' > /home/afkar/.ssh/authorized_keys;
